summary: Just a bat command to make everyone your follower.
descriptionHtml:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Unrar the archive
Copy makefollower.txt in your Data folder.

Open console
Click on the NPC you want to make your follower
Type bat makefollower
Press Enter
Close the console
Talk to NPC
~enjoy~

I don\'t know if this was done before, but anyway, i hope it helps you, so you don\'t need a mod to do this.


MY OTHER MODS:
Argortha - The Daedric Princess - A new follower http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15853
Merhart - Werewolf Follower http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15890
author: leothebest15
